public class NotePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

A panel that lets you write down notes and look at them too

private void addColorMenuItems(java.lang.Object[]... namesAndColors)
Creates a menu item for each color and adds it to the fontColors menu.

Parameters:
namesAndColors - each Object[] contains the name of the color and the color itself, i.e. "Red",Color.red

addFontFamilyMenuItems

private void addFontFamilyMenuItems(java.lang.String[]... fontNames)
Creates a menu item for each font family (if available) and adds it to the fontFamilies menu item

Parameters:
fontNames - the first one is the shown name, the second is the proper name

addFontSizeMenuItems

private void addFontSizeMenuItems(int... sizes)
Creates a menu item for each font size and adds it to the fontSizes menu item.

Parameters:
size - a list of font sizes

addToolbarButton

public javax.swing.JButton addToolbarButton(javax.swing.Action onClick,
                                            java.lang.String imagePath,
                                            java.lang.String toolTip)
Creates a JButton given the parameters and adds it to the toolbar. ActionListeners are built in.

Parameters:
onClick - the Action to be taken when the button is clicked
imagePath - the path to the image, i.e. "save.png"
toolTip - the text to be displayed while mousing over the button
Returns:
the created JButton that was added to toolbar
